main event: A large round, bright object was observed changing colors and flashing over Harlowtown, Montana on August 28, 1954.
interesting points: The object was described as the size of a half moon and changed colors, flashing oranges, blues, and reds., It was observed moving very slowly, disappearing and reappearing in different positions., Dr. Thirty-one, a medical doctor, was among the witnesses to the sighting., The object was observed for a total of one hour and gradually faded out., A twenty power sighting scope was used for several minutes of visual observation.
sighted object: a large round, bright object changing colors
witness description: Dr. Thirty-one, a medical doctor from Harlowtown, Montana, and several other reliable witnesses
